ygData.subject: Can get only the first record from a gzipped warc file
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I am porting my app from Heritrix 1.14.x to 3.1.1. I came across a strange behaviour while trying to read the warc files. Here is the code snippet:

Hi,

I am porting my app from Heritrix 1.14.x to 3.1.1. I came across a str=
ange behaviour while trying to read the warc files. Here is the code snippe=
t:

ArchiveReader reader =3D WARCReaderFactory.get(arcFile);
Iterator<Archi=
veRecord> iter =3D reader.iterator();

int count =3D 1;
while (iter.hasNext=
()) {
  ArchiveRecord arcRecord =3D (ArchiveRecord) iter.next();
  count++;=

}


I can get only one record (only WARC-Type: warcinfo) if the warc file =
is gzipped. If I decompress the file and try the same code on the decompres=
sed file, I can read all of the records.

What am I missing here?

Thanks i=
n advance.
